editorialSummary.text: Luxury label's designer fashion store, also selling cosmetics, jewelry & other accessories.

originalText.text: I Don‚Äôt Usually Right Reviews But I Want To Show My Appreciation & Experience At This Dior Boutique. Kristina Is Such a Great Dior Associate! She Greeted Me And Welcomed Me With A Big Smile. She Is A Person That Wont Force You To Purchase Something But I Can Tell That She Is Very Passionate About Her Job. She Even Offered Me Water & A Glass Of Champagne. That Was So Nice Of Her And She Was Very Sweet. There Was A Last Piece Of Purse That I Really Wanted And Kristina Asked Me If I Wanted A New One And She Will Prepare It And Ship It For Me Since I Live In New Jersey And She Even Explained To Me About Sales Tax Would Be Lower Compared To NY tax. But I Wanted The Purse So Bad And Didn't Hesitate To Purchase It On The Spot. Kristina Showed Me The Details Of The Purse That I Wanted It Was Fabulous! Kristina Was Very Patient With Me And Made Sit Down And Served Me With Water & Champagne While I Was Enjoying My Moment At The Boutique‚Ä¶Definitely Coming Back Here. Wishing You All The Best Kristina. You Are A Perfect Fit In This Company. God Bless And Keep Loving What You Do And Doing What You Love. Thank You For Everything. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

originalText.text: Horrible customer service from a male sale associate (I would tell you his name if I noticed). Do not recommend this location. He was probably a manager or something but omg üò± he was so rude and I have never seen a sale associate that rude before in my life. His evil eyes scared me to leave the store. I was going to purchase things from dior I was a tourist from out of state. I went to dior at Soho and purchased a few things.

originalText.text: Great location at Hudson Yards. Super friendly staff. Thank you!

text.text: Great location at Hudson Yards. Super friendly staff. Thank you!

originalText.text:
Ordered a pair of sandals from this location on July 1st. I finally received them today, July 20th. I kept getting the same run around that ‚Äúthey‚Äôre coming from Texas‚Äù. Supposedly the Texas store had to send to them, in NY, and then they sent to me. Makes no sense. I ordered a pair of shoes from London (another brand), AFTER I ordered these sandals‚Ä¶the shoes from London arrived faster than the Dior sandals in Texas. Something doesn‚Äôt add up here. My guess is that they charged me for my sandals and then forgot to order them. Had I not been on top of them, who knows if I would have even received them.
Spoke to Dior‚Äôs customer service who basically just passed on the message to the store. Two managers called me but really didn‚Äôt offer me any options. They just apologized profusely while I kept waiting for a product I had paid for 20 days before.
I don‚Äôt recommend this store! Very disappointed by this whole transaction!

originalText.text: There is an Asian Men sales  with glasses this shop, and his attitude is very bad. Discriminating against guests. Im ask :do you have size 35 shoes? He said we didn't have any pair of shoes that were size 35 and he walked away. I wanted to buy a pair of high heels and a hat. He turned away, and I didn't know who to call .
